channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Renault 5 EV Review: Specs, Price, Availability
item.description: It’s rare for WIRED to pronounce a new car an instant smash hit, but the all-electric Renault 5 ticks all the boxes.

item.title: VC megadeals are booming — and AI is surprisingly not the top category

item.title: The Best Electric Bikes of 2024 That We've Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested the best electric bikes in every category: commuting, mountain biking, foldable, cruisers, and more.

item.title: 10 Best Tested Laptop Stands for Any Setup (2024)
item.description: Raising your computer screen with a laptop stand is an easy fix for a healthier posture. These stands, lap desks, and risers may help.

item.title: The 23 Best Movies on Amazon Prime Right Now (October 2024)
item.description: No Time to Die, Killer Heat, and American Fiction are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.
